contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Guðjón Arnar Kristjánsson.jpg|thumb|right|Guðjón Arnar Kristjánsson]] '''Guðjón Arnar Kristjánsson''' (born 5 July 1944) is an [[Iceland]]ic politician and chairman of the [[Liberal Party (Iceland)|Liberal Party]] (Frjálslyndi flokkurinn) from 2003 to 2009. He served as the captain of fishing vessels in the years from 1967 to 1997. He was an active member of the [[Independence Party (Iceland)|Independence Party]] and attended meetings of [[Althingi]] 8 times in 1991-1995. In 1999 he joined [[Sverrir Hermannsson]] and formed the [[Liberal Party (Iceland)|Liberal Party]]. He was a member of Althingi from 1999 to 2009. ==External links== *[http://www.althingi.is/cv_en.php4?ksfaerslunr=32 Curriculum vitae at Althingi.is] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Gudjon Arnar Kristjansson | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Icelandic politician | DATE OF BIRTH = 5 July 1944 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Gudjon Arnar Kristjansson}} [[Category:1944 births|Kristjansson, Gudjon Arnar]] [[Category:Living people|Kristjansson, Gudjon Arnar]] [[Category:Members of the Althing]] [[Category:Independence Party (Iceland) politicians]] [[Category:Liberal Party (Iceland) politicians]] {{Iceland-politician-stub}}
